description.narrative: Programme will focus on i) public sector policies & legal/regulatory frameworks for effective public sector management; ii) institutional transparency, accountability iii) Non-state Actor engagement to demand for accountability &transparency.

title.narrative: Institutional Effectiveness Strategic Result Area Prodoc_signed
Call for Solutions; Reversing Rapid Deforestation in Uganda
Designing and Implementing a Process and Impact Evaluation for the EU/UN Spotlight Initiative to Eliminate Violence Against Women and Girls in Uganda
International Consultant provide technical Expertise in the Finalization of the National Industrial Strategy for Uganda-2020/21-2024/25
Proposals (RFPs) to implement Grants for addressing violence against Women and Girls under the Spotlight Initiative
RFP: Construction of cooking stoves in 3 schools in Maracha District
RFP: conducting local economy and business assessment; and develop district investment profiles for the districts of Bunyangabu, Kabarole, Luuka, Maracha & Namutumba
UNDP-RFP/UGA20/002 Design and deliver training and mentoring for staff

UNDP-RFP/UGA20/003 Develop/Review the Training curricula for pre-service and in-service training institutions to integrate Violence Against Women and Children, Harmful Practices and Sexual and Reproductive Health Rights

UNDP-RFP/UGA20/004 Develop and operationalize Internal Accountability Mechanisms and Performance Management Systems for effective prevention and response programming of Violence Against Women and Children and Harmful Practices (VAW/VAC/HP) in selected MDA
UNDP-RFP/UGA20/005 implement Grants for addressing violence against Women and Girls in Mining under the Spotlight Initiative Sector in Amudat, Kasese, Kitgum, Arua and Tororo Districts

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to
